Become a Super Hero Volunteer: Help Clean Up Maryland’s Voter Rolls - Secure The Vote MD

September 17, 2025 news
Are you ready to be a part of something that truly makes a difference? Join our team of Super Hero Volunteers and take on one of the most important tasks in preserving the integrity of our elections: cleaning up Maryland’s voter rolls. This is tip-of-the-sword work—vital, behind-the-scenes action that helps ensure every vote cast in Maryland is legitimate and every taxpayer dollar is used wisely. Inaccurate voter rolls result in ballots being mailed to people who have moved or passed away, wasting resources and raising serious concerns about election integrity. Your efforts can help stop that. What Will You Be Doing? You’ll help improve the accuracy of Maryland’s voter registration lists by searching available public sources to verify voter records. This project is: Non-partisan – Open to anyone who values fair and clean elections Flexible – Volunteer as many hours as you want, on your own schedule Remote – Work from the comfort of your home Impactful – Results will be submitted directly to local Boards of Elections by Team Leaders in each Maryland county What Do You Need? A computer with Windows 10 or later Basic internet search skills Software and training provided Tech support available every step of the way Whether you can give a few hours a week or a few hours a month, your help matters . How to Get Started To join the mission, simply send an email to: Jean goal948@gmail.com with the subject line: “Super Hero Volunteer” We’ll take it from there! You’ll receive instructions, software access, and training to get you up and running. Why It Matters Accurate voter rolls are the backbone of secure, trustworthy elections. By volunteering your time and skills, you’ll be directly supporting: Election integrity Genuinely saving Maryland taxpayer dollars Public confidence in the electoral process Be more than a concerned citizen—be a Super Hero Volunteer . Maryland’s future needs people like you.
